entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers near the Cariboo mountains in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023
